animal.question: I meow and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm a good friend. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I live in a doghouse.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Some people put a bell around my neck

animal.question: I quack and like to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🩱 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🧡 Some people think I'm tasty with orange sauce

animal.question: I am big and grey and have a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I'm the largest animal that lives on land.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I am known as the king of the jungle, and I roar loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane around my head.
🍖 I eat meat.
🦁 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
🦓 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I swing from tree to tree and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🙉 I make a lot of noise.
🐒 I live in the jungle.
🌴 I have a long tail to help me balance.

animal.question: I carry my home on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I am a reptile.
🏠 I can hide inside my shell.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I live in Africa.
🤎 I have brown spots.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back!
🥗 I like to eat lettuce and other plants.
🐌 I am not very fast.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🛥️ Ships travel on my surface.
🐋 Big animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze into small spaces.
💪 I have no bones.
⚫ I squirt ink when scared.

ocean.question: I am a home to many fish and plants under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of small animals.
🐠 Colorful fish like to live near me.
☀️ I am found in warm, shallow waters.

ocean.question: I am a very large sea creature with teeth. I'm known for having many rows of teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 People are sometimes scared of me.
🌊 I have fins to help me swim.
🦷 I lose teeth all the time, but they grow back.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the sea, and I can balance a ball on my nose. What am I?

hints.text: 🦭 I am very smart and playful.
🎶 You can see me perform tricks.
🐟 I like to eat fish.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal, I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🌊 I have a blowhole on the top of my head.
🎙️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.

ocean.question: I’m a fish that can shock you with electricity! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I use my power to catch food.
🐟 I live in muddy waters.
🔋 I can give a zap!

ocean.question: I am a creature that looks like a plant, but I'm actually an animal that lives in the ocean. I have stinging cells.

hints.text: 🎐 I drift in the water, moved by currents.
🥶 Some types can sting, while others don't.
🌊 I look like an umbrella in the water.

ocean.question: I am a slow moving bottom-dweller that looks like a star. Some of my species can regrow arms.

hints.text: ⭐ I am not a fish.
🌊 I use suction cups to move and eat.
🖐️ I have radial symmetry.
